title: Ore no Itoshi no NEET-kun
original_name: 俺の愛しのニートくん
sinopse:
Chiaki, who is afraid of interacting with other people, is a great NEET. He wants to change and decides to show a cool part of himself to Keiichi Naruse , who has taken care of him since kindergarten, and decided to actually find a permanent workplace. However, recently, Keiichi’s attitude has been somewhat aloof...!?

(Source: Shinshokan, translated)

Included one-shot: Bokutotsu Kareshi
